Articles.Content:
This game is simple, you just post how your username came to be.

I will start, around 8 or so years ago me and my brother wanted a Roblox account. So we made one(and an email for it) to share it's username was the first three letters of both our names. We lost that account and made a new one that was only the first 2 letters of each, and I made a different one with a two at the end for Minecraft or something, so sometimes my gamer tag has a 2 at the end. But me, being the older brother, got the email and account in the end.

Edited October 28, 2022 by Ryaja
I created mine because I remembered all of my many failed SSTO’s
Comes from Warhamer Online back in the late 2000's. Has been my gaming handle ever since.

Mine comes from my Random Names database.

Spoiler 
#   +---------------------------------+
#   | Random land and character names |
#   +---------------------------------+
# Carméderne,Aconodale,Aurytutayet,Aeliae,
# Lutamak,Watifazem,Scyridil,Yizaduf,Ycéa,
# Nylia,Sixoyaul,Cipagnon,Nauzubil,Nyélus,
# Elilnir,Rituadel,Depeq,Evaxanis,Méiopyx,
# Naldéia,Torfis,Nazalassa,Oxeyabe,Luwaca,
# Asirdova,Mezy,Tikay,Roinar,Vanti,Xocmil,
# Surcoudia,Refuq,Wagicye,Myonel,Seuillae,
# Eatar,Ogaïon,Syploque,Armyllie,Runelune,
# Secota,Larcana,Hydron,Yaltar,Arkéliande,
# Nyx,Thulicre,Osmir,Noisel,Nobène,Balyos,
# Noiret,Luwaca,Lacius,Tergon,Noryn,Esson,
# Aryna,Rubinion,Niria,Palmyr,kartan,Yiuz,
# Nagaezzo,Anuveram,Fieixie,Zyliuq,Nelpen,

(from  beta.py , on my calculator.)
(Please note that they are sadly not in the public domain... Yet. Please don't use them for public projects. Sorry.)

Edited October 28, 2022 by Nazalassa
Sea of Osmir
I had my PFP a rutabaga for a while, then a rutabaga in a space suit, changing my name was one of my first posts and my greatest regrets.
I've been developing hi-tech military weapons in KSP when I return to the Forum. And I want to make myself a new guy. So, I change my name.
